text: Ignacio Walker Prieto (born 7 January 1956) is a Chilean lawyer, politician, and, author who has served as Foreign Minister of Chile (2004–2006). He has been member a parliament twice, first as deputy (1994–2002) and since 2010 as senator. He has eight siblings, including politicians Patricio Walker and . He is a grandchild of , his great-grandfather is . ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean lawyers Category:Christian Democratic Party (Chile) politicians Category:Foreign ministers of Chile Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies of Chile Category:Members of the Senate of Chile Category:Politicians from Santiago Category:Chilean people of English descent Category:20th-century Chilean lawyers Category:21st-century Chilean lawyers
